Name: Additional Services Confirmation
Notes:
need to adjust the message according to the client but this is a draft of what have been communicated before 

Ahead of today's kick-off meeting, I would like to clarify some pending items.
Setup Fees and Process
    Game License Fee: €10,000 per year, paid per brand. We ask for your consent for us to start this process.
    Alias Domains: The first 25 aliases will be registered by us for free with the Anjouan authority. However, you must purchase these alias domains yourself and provide us with proof of purchase first.
    Platform Fee: €15,000 for the installation of the EGT platform. If the website goes live by September 15, 2025, this fee will be refunded as a deduction from your initial invoice.
Additional Services That Require Your Consent
    Sports Betting (Sportsbook): There are minimum monthly requirements as outlined in the MOU. Confirm whether you want to receive this service.
    Virtual Sports: There are minimum monthly requirements as outlined in the MOU. Confirm whether you want to receive this service.
    Email Messaging: A dedicated IP is recommended for marketing messages. The annual fee is €750. Confirm if you want to continue with the dedicated IP.
We look forward to obtaining your approval for the above items and starting the process without delay.
Best regards
